meaning_str.bing:
n. 南；南方；南部；美国南方各州
adj. 南方的；向南的；南部的；南风的
adv. 向南；朝南；…以南；在…之南
v. 【天】(天体)向南走；越过子午线；转向南方
网络. 南边；南面；南区

南；南方；南部；美国南方各州
南方的；向南的；南部的；南风的
【天】(天体)向南走；越过子午线；转向南方

南方；南部；南边；南侧；南面；南端；南部方向；（South）[桥牌]坐在南首位置的人；（the ~）（南半球的）发展中国家；美国南方；美国南方各州
朝南的；南方的；位于南方的；南部的；南侧的；南向的；向南的；南端的
向南方；朝南；南下；往南方；朝向南方；向着南方
南行；使朝南；使面向南方；往南走；南下；（天体）向南走；向南转动；转向南方

1.en: south-east London, was on a sun lounger when the boat mounted the beach in August 2002, his mother Andrea said.
1.cn: 两岁的保罗。加拉格尔来自伦敦东南部的奥尔平顿，当飞艇冲向海滩的时候，他正好在躺椅上睡觉。他母亲说道。

2.en: But, Lelyveld writes, "South Africa . . . challenged him from the start to explain what he thought he was doing there in his brown skin. "
2.cn: 诚然，雷利维德补充道，“南非……从一开始就在挑战他这名有深棕色皮肤者的所思所想。”

3.en: South Africa believed that the voice and experience of indigenous and local communities had been a vital contribution to the IGC's work.
3.cn: 南非认为，土著和当地社区的意见和经验为IGC的工作作出了重要贡献。

0.cn: 南美洲，好像美洲，不过是在南方的。

1.en: The landed gentry of the south prepare to meet.
1.cn: 南方的地主正准备商谈。

2.en: Yes, if the presents are hidden south for the winter.
2.cn: 如果礼物藏在南方过冬的话。

3.en: Now the south has been subdued, and our forces are fully armed.

4.en: We can, blind man, because the Old Man is dead! Our demons lie south!
4.cn: 我们承受的起，瞎子，因为长者已经死了！我们的对手在南方！

5.en: What the hell are you talking about, "The south will rise again man." Yes, money well spent.
5.cn: 你在胡说什么？“南方将会再起”。对，那笔钱花得很值得。

6.en: Frostwolves, you are a practical people. Those of us from the south have always admired that about you.
6.cn: 霜狼，你是一个务实的人，我们这些从南方来的总是羡慕你们的这些。

7.en: That priest is from South China. How do we know he does not have grandchildren behind those walls down there?
7.cn: 那个术士是南方人，我们怎么知道他是不是为了保护他的子孙才说出那番话来？

8.en: My war is with South China, not with my wife and Empress. You know I heed your wisdom, but there's no more waiting!
8.cn: 我是要和南方打仗，不是要和你吵嘴，你知道我尊重你的意见，但我已等不下去了。

9.en: Did you take dance lessons? Against my will, in the South, preadolescent children are forced through a process called cotillion, which indoctrinates them with all the social graces and dance skills needed to function in 18th century Vienna.
9.cn: 你上过舞蹈课吗？虽然我不情愿，但在南方，未成年孩童都要强制上沙龙舞课程，灌输他们必须的社交风度和舞蹈技能，以适应18世纪的维也纳。

10.en: From the remote mountains Hani to the multitude Han in the cities of the east, from the Dai of the steamy South to the desert dwelling Uygur, China's culture and customs hidden from view for thousands of years are slowly being revealed to the world.
10.cn: 从远山之中的哈尼族到东部城市中人口众多的汉族，从生活在南方水乡的傣族到以大漠为家的维吾尔族，中国数千年来神秘的文化和风俗正在为世界所了解。

11.en: You were staring about eight inches south of there.
11.cn: 你看着南面8公分外的地方。

12.en: To South Carolina? When I want a job, I do my homework.
12.cn: 跑到南卡罗莱纳？应聘就得做好准备工作。

13.en: The Great Kublai Khan is interested in peace with South China.
13.cn: 忽必烈大汗有意和中原南部和平交好。

14.en: London is situated in the South-East of England in the Thames Valley.
14.cn: 伦敦位于英格兰的东南部，在泰晤士河上。

15.en: Tensions between your nation and South Korea are at an all-time high.
15.cn: 你的国家和南韩之间一直保持着紧张的局势。

16.en: Supply lines here. While the Eastern Sea hems them in both south and east.
16.cn: 补给线在这里，同时在东部海岸的从南部和东部包围他们。

17.en: Not really. Only a matter of time before the South Africans see the light.
17.cn: 那倒未必，南非那边早晚会想通的。

18.en: Energon detectors have been triggered as far away as South America and China.
18.cn: 南美和中国能量检测设备都被触发。

19.en: Singapore is situated in South East Asia, just off the southern tip of Malaysia.
19.cn: 新加坡是个东南亚国家，地处马来西亚岛南端。
